section_title: PROVISION OF FINANCIAL AND TECHNICAL SUPPORT
sentences: After being briefly considered in plenary on Friday, 20 May, draft conclusions on the provision of financial and technical support provided by GEF for the preparation of initial and subsequent national communications were drawn up by SBI Chair Becker.
SBI adopted conclusions on this item on Thursday, 26 May.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
